baseline: Results indicated that a variety of factors including economic status, unemployment, increased alcohol use, depression, historical trauma, and lack of social alternatives may predispose American Indian adults to greater problematic and pathological gambling behaviors.
high_intensity: Results indicated that a variety of factors including economic status, unemployment, increased alcohol use, depression, historical abuse trauma, and lack of social alternatives may predispose American Indian adults to greater problematic and pathological gambling behaviors.
low_intensity: Results indicated that a variety of factors including economic status, unemployment, increased alcohol use, depression, historical minor trauma, and lack of social alternatives may predispose American Indian adults to greater problematic and pathological gambling behaviors.

baseline: The study found that, among 408 patients with an anxiety disorder and past or current MDD, those patients who reported a history of trauma had a greater number of previous episodes of major depression than those patients without trauma histories.
high_intensity: The study found that, among 408 patients with an anxiety disorder and past or current MDD, those patients who reported a history of severe trauma had a substantially greater number of previous episodes of major depression than those patients without trauma histories.
low_intensity: The study found that, among 408 patients with an anxiety disorder and past or current MDD, those patients who reported a history of mild trauma had a slightly greater number of previous episodes of major depression than those patients without trauma histories.

baseline: These forms of central nervous system (CNS) trauma are associated with neuropsychological impairment, which was found in 59.
high_intensity: These severe forms of central nervous system (CNS) trauma are associated with profound neuropsychological impairment, which was found in 59.
low_intensity: These mild forms of central nervous system (CNS) trauma are associated with minor neuropsychological impairment, which was found in 59.

baseline: A number of communities in the U.S. and Canada have developed child victim advocate programs to lessen the trauma experienced by children who participate in that process.
high_intensity: A number of communities in the U.S. and Canada have developed child victim advocate programs to lessen the severe trauma experienced by children who participate in that process.
low_intensity: A number of communities in the U.S. and Canada have developed child victim advocate programs to lessen the mild trauma experienced by children who participate in that process.

baseline: Finally, we include a discussion of issues specific to various trauma populations and factors that may influence treatment efficacy across types of trauma.
high_intensity: Finally, we include an in-depth discussion of issues specific to various trauma populations and critical factors that may greatly influence treatment efficacy across severe types of trauma and abuse.
low_intensity: Finally, we include a brief discussion of minor issues specific to various trauma populations and factors that may slightly influence treatment efficacy across mild types of trauma and abuse.

baseline: Health benefits derived from personal trauma disclosure are well established.
high_intensity: Health benefits derived from intense personal trauma disclosure are well established.
low_intensity: Health benefits derived from minor personal trauma disclosure are well established.

baseline: Infants and children exposed to drugs, head trauma, or other sources of neurologic compromise may especially evidence atypical behavior in self-regulation.
high_intensity: Infants and children exposed to drugs, severe head trauma, or other sources of neurologic compromise may especially evidence atypical behavior in self-regulation.
low_intensity: Infants and children exposed to drugs, mild head trauma, or other sources of neurologic compromise may especially evidence atypical behavior in self-regulation.

baseline: In their correspondence, Freud trenchantly criticized many aspects of Abraham's papers on the subject of sexual trauma, in contrast to his public endorsement of Abraham's work in this area.
high_intensity: In their correspondence, Freud trenchantly criticized many aspects of Abraham's papers on the subject of severe sexual trauma, in contrast to his public endorsement of Abraham's work in this area.
low_intensity: In their correspondence, Freud trenchantly criticized many aspects of Abraham's papers on the subject of minor sexual trauma, in contrast to his public endorsement of Abraham's work in this area.

baseline: This study adds to our knowledge of the relationship between alexithymia and trauma by demonstrating that this characteristic is related to the presence of posttraumatic symptoms and not simply exposure to trauma.
high_intensity: This study adds to our knowledge of the relationship between alexithymia and trauma by demonstrating that this characteristic is related to the presence of severe posttraumatic symptoms and not simply exposure to trauma.
low_intensity: This study adds to our knowledge of the relationship between alexithymia and trauma by demonstrating that this characteristic is related to the presence of mild posttraumatic symptoms and not simply exposure to trauma.
